altername_name: Atelier Elie: Elie no Atelier: Salburg no Renkinjutsushi 2
name: Atelier Elie: The Alchemist of Salburg 2
overview: A direct sequel to Atelier Marie, Atelier Elie follows Elie, a girl who was saved by the protagonist of the last game. Aspiring to become more like Marie, Elie enrolls into the same academy as Marie had previously attended.
